author: wn.com
title: Associate Professor Naoya Shibata and Lecturer Yasuhide Inokuma Awarded Nagase Prizes (University of Tokyo)
text: ( Source : University of Tokyo ) Date of activity : September 25 , 2015 On September 25, 2015, the 5th Nagase Prize was awarded to Associate Professor Naoya Shibata from the Institute of Engineering Innovation in the University of Tokyo's
